name: Yusuf Yaslan
content: Main Page Yusuf Yaslan, PhD Main Page Biography Courses Publications Research Yusuf Yaslan, PhD Associate Professor Department of Computer Engineering Computer & Informatics Faculty Istanbul Technical University 34469 Maslak Istanbul - TURKEY Room: 2216 E-mail: yyaslan at itu dot edu dot tr Phone: +90 212 285 7544 Announcement: Students who want to do a graduation project with me should have taken BLG454E Learning From Data and passed with BA/AA or should have completed a related MOOC course (e.g. Machine Learning at Coursera).
